edu.biu.scapi.interactiveMidProtocols.ot.otBatch.otExtension

Class OTExtensionGeneralSInput

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.biu.scapi.interactiveMidProtocols.ot.otBatch.otExtension.OTExtensionGeneralSInput
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    OTBatchSInput

    public class OTExtensionGeneralSInput
extends java.lang.Object
implements OTBatchSInput
    A concrete class for OT extension input for the sender.

    In the general OT extension scenario the sender gets x0 and x1 for each OT.

    Author:
    Cryptography and Computer Security Research Group Department of Computer Science Bar-Ilan University (Meital Levy)

    • Constructor Detail

      • OTExtensionGeneralSInput

        public OTExtensionGeneralSInput(byte[] x0Arr,
                        byte[] x1Arr,
                        int numOfOts)
        Constructor that sets x0, x1 for each OT element and the number of OTs.
        Parameters:
        x1Arr - holds all the x0 for all the senders serially.
        x0Arr - holds all the x1 for all the senders serially.
        numOfOts - Number of OTs in the OT extension.
